top_negative.sent: The disruption could occur for many reasons, including fire, natural disasters, weather, water scarcity, manufacturing problems, disease, widespread illness (such as the COVID-19 pandemic), strikes, labor shortages, transportation or supply interruption, contractual dispute, government regulation, cybersecurity attacks or terrorism.

forward_snippets: We believe that our team and the culture we have created, through the integration of two companies into one, are truly our competitive advantage.
2 Table of Contents PRODUCT AND PACKAGE INNOVATION We are focused on a robust innovation pipeline within our portfolio of products to build household penetration of our business.
